string-array.name: moodHappyText
string-array.item: "The righteous cry, and the LORD hears, and delivers them out of all their troubles."
"Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart."
"Happy is the one who seizes your infants and dashes them against the rocks."
"A happy heart makes the face cheerful, but heartache crushes the spirit."
"Our mouths were filled with laughter, our tongues with songs of joy."
"Because the sky clears when I think of you, I gave my sadness away."
"In the end, there's going to be somebody who'll just want you, so, you just do you."

string-array.name: moodOkayText
string-array.item: "Commit your way to the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass."
"He heals the broken in heart, and binds up their wounds."
"Cast your cares on the LORD and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken."
"You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you."
"For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind."
"It won't be easy, but have this engraved in you heart: if you think you're gonna crash, accelerate even harder."

string-array.name: moodUpsetText
string-array.item: "Don’t give in to worry or anger; it only leads to trouble."
"Keep your temper under control; it is foolish to harbor a grudge."
"A soft answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger."
"If you become angry, do not let your anger lead you into sin, and do not stay angry all day."
"Get rid of all bitterness, passion, and anger. No more shouting or insults, no more hateful feelings of any sort."

string-array.name: moodSadText
string-array.item: "It's alright to stop. \nDon't run without knowing where you're going anymore."
"We deserve a life. \nWhether it's big or small, you're just doing you."
"Life is long, go slow. \nAt the end, there will be a paradise of your dreams."
"I hope you don't forget that giving up decisively also counts as courage."
"Sorrow is better than laughter, for sadness has a refining influence on us."
"I consider that our present sufferings are not worth comparing with the glory that will be revealed in us."
"Don't be afraid and hold my hand."
"It won't be easy, but have this engraved in you heart: if you think you're gonna crash, accelerate even harder."
"In the end, there's going to be somebody who'll just want you, so, you just do you."
"Don't disappear because you are one great existence.\nLet us shine."
"Someone else will surely be comforted by your thorns.\nWe are each other's night scenery, each other's moon."
"I won't say clichéd things like 'have strength'\nI'll just listen to you."
"It's okay to shed the tears, but don't you tear yourself."
